## Purpose

Use this skill for web-specific screenshot snapshot defaults.

## When to use

- Web UI changed (components, styles, pages, visual states).
- `$visual-regression-testing` indicates platform `web`.

## How to use

1) Open `references/visual-regression-web.md`.
2) Map repo commands to web verify/record workflow.
3) Run checks in a stable environment and report artifact paths.
